configurationItems.name: check_tlp
configurationItems.description: Define if the analyzer should check TLP of data before running

configurationItems.name: max_tlp
configurationItems.description: Define the maximum TLP level autorized

configurationItems.name: username
configurationItems.description: Define the username of the account used to connect the service

configurationItems.name: key
configurationItems.description: Define the API key to use to connect the service
